class.name: Matcher
class.doc:
Matchers reduces down output of fort::myrmidon::Query with some criterions.
* AntIDMatcher : fort::myrmidon::AntID must match a given ID * AntColumnMatcher : an fort::myrmidon::AntStaticValue must match a given value. * AntDistanceSmallerThan,AntDistanceGreaterThan : for interaction queries anly, ensure some criterion for the distance between fort::myrmidon::Ant. * AntAngleSmallerThan/AntAngleGreaterThan : for interaction queries only, ensure that angle between fort::myrmidon::Ant meets sopme criterion.
## Combination
Using And or Or, one can combine several Matcher together to build more complex criterion.

constructor.name: Matcher
constructor.doc: User should not build a matcher directly, they must use this class static methods instead.

method.name: And
method.doc: AND combines several Matcher together. The resulting Matcher will match only if all of the given Matcher matches too.

return.doc: a new Matcher which is the AND combination of the given Matchers.

method.name: AntAngleGreaterThan
method.brief: Matches an angle between two Ants
method.doc: Matches that the angle between two Ants is greater than angle, only valid for interaction queries.

return.doc: a fort::myrmidon::Matcher::Ptr that matches when two fort::myrmidon::Ant are not facing the same direction with angle threshold.

argument.name: angle
argument.doc: the angle to be greater (in radians).

method.name: AntAngleSmallerThan
method.brief: Matches an angle between two Ants
method.doc: Matches that the angle between two Ants is smaller than angle, only valid for interaction queries.

return.doc: a fort::myrmidon::Matcher::Ptr that matches when two fort::myrmidon::Ant are facing the same direction with angle threshold.

argument.name: angle
argument.doc: the angle to be smaller (in radians).

method.name: AntColumnMatcher
method.doc: Matches a given fort::myrmidon::AntStaticValue. In case of interactions, matches any interaction with one of the Ant meeting the criterion.

return.doc: a fort::myrmidon::Matcher::Ptr that matches fort::myrmidon::Ant with the value matching that fort::myrmidon::Ant

argument.name: name
argument.doc: the name of the column to match against

method.name: AntDistanceGreaterThan
method.brief: Matches a distance between two Ants
method.doc: Matches that a distance between two Ants is greater than distance, only valid for interaction queries.

return.doc: a fort::myrmidon::Matcher::Ptr that matches two fort::myrmidon::Ant outside the given distance

method.name: AntDistanceSmallerThan
method.brief: Matches a distance between two Ants
method.doc: Matches that a distance between two Ants is smaller than distance, only valid for interaction queries.

return.doc: a fort::myrmidon::Matcher::Ptr that matches two fort::myrmidon::Ant within the given distance

method.name: AntIDMatcher
method.doc: Matches a given fort::myrmidon::AntID. In case of interactions, matches any interaction with one of the Ant with the given ID

return.doc: a fort::myrmidon::Matcher::Ptr that matches fort::myrmidon::Ant of the given ID

method.name: Or
method.doc: OR combines several Matcher together. The resulting Matcher will match if any of the given Matcher matches too.

return.doc: a new Matcher which is the OR combination of the given Matchers.
